results.name: The Iconic House on Redwood Hill
Endless Runner Game by Sahil Ansari

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphic 4600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
